Cupertino.NASA Ames Exploration Center:
The NASA Ames Exploration Center (also called the NASA Ames Visitor Center) is a science museum/visitor center at the entrance of NASA's Ames Research Center in Moffett Field, California. The center has the following exhibits:
A Moon rock, a part of the lunar samples returned by the Apollo 15 mission in 1971.
The Mercury-Redstone 1A capsule, launched in 1960 in a suborbital flight, it achieved an altitude of 130.7 miles.
